attributes.action: Stop the attacks on are freedoom's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i urge the pime minister to stop chipping away out right's to free speach our right's to decide if we want id card's or not. A vote on the eu constitution, abandenment of the road toll, gps tracking,the microchip in the new passport's ie an id card in the back door', scrap plans for a huge dna data base, and to scrap the bin police, and most of all stop lying for a second

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
